title: 30 min Yoga for Weight Loss | Fat Burning Workout | At - Home

channelDescription:
Business enquiries ONLY: akshayaagnes@gmail.com 

WELCOME TO MY CHANNEL ♥ Hey, I’m Akshaya Agnes. A certified Health & Fitness Coach (IISM), Pilates & Yoga Instructor, and nutritionist ready to help you achieve your health goals in the comfort of your own home! I've been in the fitness industry for over 14 years! I am glad to guide people and share my knowledge by making videos! Hence I’ve created this platform where you can access ALL of my workouts! Yoga, pilates, cardio, strength training, weights and more. I hope my videos will help you reach your fitness goals and achieve the healthy lifestyle you’ve always dreamed about. Keep flowing 🥀

Follow my instagram account - @move.with.agnes
tags: how to lose weight with yoga
embedHtml: <iframe width="480" height="270" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/Vu_NnDWxKY4" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
comments: 61 kg plz like my comment so that I can reach my goal for 55 kg . Thanku 😊

Day 1: feels fresh and new. Can't wait to do it everyday. Motivated💪
Day 2: easier than 1st day
Day 3: felt the actual burn in my thigh muscles
Day 6: loving it
Day 14: Doing a mix of your different weight loss yoga videos. I can feel my muscles strengthening.

A late update after 1 month : I lost 4 kgs😍, even without any changes in diet . Feeling more and more motivated day by day. If I can do it. Anyone can do it.
2 months update: lost 6 kgs. Happy and motivated
3 Rd month update: I was busy with work and lost my routine. Still hanging to 6 kg loss. I have started again and this time Iam confident that I will get back my routine and achieve the Target.
7 months update : lost 9 kgs,🤩 with no changes in diet, but I added slow jogging to my routine...3-4 days a week.
Thanku ladies for so much love! 💞
A year apart: I had my weight loss resolution on my star birthday 2023. And today, a year later, on my star birthday..I see I lost 10 kg. A slow steady add on daily has now become a routine (though there are days when I don't feel like doing anything and skipping workout). A year older today but feeling younger and healthier than last year.
I can came here after the pcos video.. I'm so glad I found her. My periods are regulated. And now I'm here. Love ya ~

updating every day for idk how long but pls like to remind me!!
I'm doing this for posture, flexibility and mental health reasons as well as weight loss. I've noticed yoga makes me a calmer and happier person overall.

Day 1: DRENCHED IN SWEAT!! a little bit difficult but not too bad as i'm not that new into yoga.
Day2: Absolutely killed it! Feeling proud of myself.
Day3: Lacking motivation but im just gonna keep going ahead, bc i made a goal so imma stick with it.
i never thought i’d be able to get a good workout cause i’m not really good with fast paced high intensity stuff, but after doing all this i feel so good and honestly just full of serotonin
